titleStmt.title: SII 7.769: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 769. (A.R. No. 145 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . komāṟapaṉmar tiripuvaṉac
cakkaravatti śrīvirapāṇṭiyatevaṟkku yāṇṭu
1 10 5vatu nāyaṉār teyvanāyakaṉkoyil nampi
mārum tiruppatiyārum tirumeykāppārum Ivvaṉaivom
nāyiṉār teyvaṉāyakaṉukku Uṭaiyār puttuḻāṉ tiruvaraṅka
ccelvaṉ villavarāyaṉ ceyvitta Ulakamuṇṭāṉ ti
ruttoppukku Ellaiyāvatu keṭilavāṟṟukkum tirucca
kkarattuṟaikkum teṟkku viḷaṅkuḷattu kaḻanikku meṟku piḷ
kkālukku kiḻakku malaikku vaṭakku Iṉṉāṉkellaikku
naṭuvupaṭṭa tiruttoppil teṅku māppalā puḷi nelli Iluppai U
ḷḷuṭṭa maramum veḷitaṟaiyil maramuḷḷiṭṭa payirum ceyvittu
Āṇṭutoṟum mutalāṉa mutal Eṅkaḷil Okkukoṇṭu Amutupa
ṭikku Āṇṭu Oṉṟukku Āyirattaiñūṟu teṅkāy Eṇṇavum nāya
ṉār teyvanāyakaṉ tirumuṉpu Iṭum tirunantāviḷakku muṉṟukku
Eṇṇai muvuḻakkukku nampimār Opāti Eṇṇai Uḻak kāḻākku ni
kki tiruppatiyā ropāti Eṇṇai Uḻak kāḻākkum nampimārvaca
me nāḷvaṭṭam Aḷakkavum tirumeykāppā ropāti Eṇ
ṇai Uḻak kāḻākkukku nācciyār śrībhūmippirāṭṭiyār tirumuṉ
pe cantiviḷakkāka patiṉaiñcu tiruviḷakku Iṭavum Ippaṭiyilt tā
ḻvupaṭac ceytomākil camaiyat turokikaḷum Irācat turo
kikaḷum paṭṭatu paṭakkaṭavomākavum Ippaṭikku cantirāti
ttavarai ceyvatākac cammatittom nampimārum tiruppatiyā
rum tirumeykāppārum Ivvaṉaivom Ippaṭi bhāradvāji
ciṅkappirāṉampi Eḻuttu bhārgavaṉ varatarācapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu kāśyapa
ṉ dāmotarapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu bhāradvāji teyvaṉāyakanampi Eḻuttu tirup
ppatiyāril kurovi Aṭiyavaṟkkumeyyanampi Eḻuttu Ellāntalaiya
ṉnampi Eḻuttu Iḻakkantiṟattu cicaṭakopatātaṉ Eḻuttu koyil
kaṇakku tiruvaihindrapurappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu tirumey
ṉeḻuttu pecumperumāḷ tāta ṉeḻuttu cirāmatāta
ppitaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.769 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
